scripts.test-integration: EXTRA_TEST_COMMAND="-m integration" docker compose --env-file .env.test -f docker-compose.test.yml up --build --exit-code-from app --remove-orphans
scripts.test: EXTRA_TEST_COMMAND="-m unit" docker compose --env-file .env.test -f docker-compose.test.yml up --build --exit-code-from app --remove-orphans
scripts.test-all: EXTRA_TEST_COMMAND="" docker compose --env-file .env.test -f docker-compose.test.yml up --build --exit-code-from app --remove-orphans
scripts.test:logs: EXTRA_TEST_COMMAND="-m unit -o log_cli=true -o log_cli_level=INFO -s" docker compose --env-file .env.test -f docker-compose.test.yml up --build --exit-code-from app --remove-orphans
scripts.test-integration:logs: EXTRA_TEST_COMMAND="-m integration -o log_cli=true -o log_cli_level=INFO -s" docker compose --env-file .env.test -f docker-compose.test.yml up --build --exit-code-from app --remove-orphans
scripts.test-all:logs: EXTRA_TEST_COMMAND="-o log_cli=true -o log_cli_level=INFO -s" docker compose --env-file .env.test -f docker-compose.test.yml up --build --exit-code-from app --remove-orphans
